title: Cant buy champ even with enough IP
body: Rito plz. Client says I have 7852, and says I dont have enough for Camille. Why you do this.

replies.body:
This is a known bug with the Beta Client. You can resolve this by launching into the *Legacy Client* from the login screen to complete your purchase.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions!
